label: 13. What forms of support has the community self-identified as most needed for the ICCA?

options.label: Appropriate recognition (legal or otherwise) from state authorities and/or other organisations
Equipment, e.g. GIS software, cameras, video recorders, computers
Technical capacity-building: IT, analytical or problem-solving skills, management plan guidance
Legal support (e.g., to file claims or resist external projects through litigation)
Partnerships for self-determined development initiatives and sustainable livelihoods
Collaboration or communication with other ICCAs
Other (please describe under the final question)
